m_szDocTitle: BMW shows off first hydrogen fuel cell cars: Crazy i8 prototype, 5 Series GT | Ars Technica
m_szDocSumamry: BMW shows off first hydrogen fuel cell cars: Crazy i8 prototype, 5 Series GT Higher efficiency and greener than other engine types, but many roadblocks remain. by Sebastian Anthony (UK)  - Jul 6, 2015 1:06 pm UTC The ridiculous i8-ish hydrogen fuel cell vehicle prototype The ridiculous i8-ish hydrogen fuel cell vehicle prototype BMW 5 Series GT, with a hydrogen fuel cell powertrain inside BMW's cryogenic hydrogen fuel tank tech Early hydrogen car users will need to be followed around by a giant refuelling truck The hydrogen fuel tank The hydrogen fuel cell The complete hydrogen fuel cell power
